Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Increases the amount of years of military service credit a member may purchase
Summary: Increases the amount of years of military service credit a member may purchase from three years to ten years.
LawCode: Amd ยง1000, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to increasing the amount of years of military service credit a member may purchase
